```{r setup}
library(blueskyR)
library(httr2)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
handle <- Sys.getenv("bluesky_id")
password <- Sys.getenv("bluesky_pwd")

infos <- bsky_create_session(handle, password)
did <- infos$did
token <- infos$access_jwt
```

```{r}
posts <- bsky_search_paginated(keyword = "covid19", access_jwt = token, number_of_posts_per_request = 100, until = "2025-07-14", max_posts = 10)

posts <- bsky_search_paginated(keyword = "measles OR sarampion OR rougeole", access_jwt = token, number_of_posts_per_request = 100, get_posts_until = "2025-07-14", max_posts = 100)

posts <- posts$posts
length(posts)

posts <- posts[1:10]
jsonlite::write_json(posts, "posts.json")
names(posts)
elements <- bsky_extract_many_posts_elements(posts)

posts <- bsky_search(keyword = "covid19", access_jwt = token, number_of_posts_per_request = 100, until = "2025-07-01")

elements[[1]]
```

## Comparison with bskyr

```{r}
library(bskyr)
set_bluesky_user(Sys.getenv("bluesky_id"))
set_bluesky_pass(Sys.getenv("bluesky_app_pwd"))

posts_bskyr <- bs_bsky_search("covid19", limit = 200)

elements_bskyr <- bsky_extract_many_posts_elements_bskyr(posts_bskyr)

elements_bskyr[[1]]

yo <- bskyr::bs_get_profile(Sys.getenv("bluesky_id"))
as.list(yo)
```
